description.value:
As an Action, magically polymorph into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the actor's choice).

In a new form, retain game statistics and ability to speak, but

  • AC,
  • movement modes,
  • Strength,
  • Dexterity, and
  • special senses

are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

FoundryVTT: Drop the new form on the sheet of this actor and use the pop up dialog to transform.
